definitions.definition: The act or art of declaiming ; rhetorical delivery; loud speaking in public.

subdefinitions.definition: The public recitation of speeches as an exercise in schools and colleges.

definitions.definition: A set or harangue ; declamatory discourse.
Pretentious rhetorical display, with more sound than sense.

main_definition: The act or art of declaiming ; rhetorical delivery; loud speaking in public.
secondary_definitions: A set or harangue ; declamatory discourse.
Pretentious rhetorical display, with more sound than sense.
